title: Desk, ca. 1933
medium: Lacquered wood, painted canvas, chromed metal
provenance: Anne and Joel Ehrenkranz (Suzanne Lipschutz/Second Hand Rose Gallery); 2006: acquired by Museum
creditline: Gift of Joel and Anne Ehrenkranz
description: Blue rectilinear form composed of rectangular drawer and shelf unit on left, two-shelf unit on right, supporting two horizontal drawers immediately below desk top; drawer and shelf units with chromed metal supports, square in section; drawers with red conical knobs; desk top covered in blue-painted canvas.

tombstone.epitaph: Desk, ca. 1933.Lacquered wood, painted canvas, chromed metal. Gift of Joel and Anne Ehrenkranz. 2006-24-1.
